oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Commercial area at corner of Illinois Avenue and Oak Ridge Turnpike
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A street intersection showing a group of small buildings with housing on a small rise above.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Automobiles; Flattop houses; Housing; Illinois Avenue; Oak Ridge Turnpike; Stores and shops
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Shops in this area include, Radio Repair Shop, Portrait Studio; Model Hobby Shop, B & B Dry Cleaning, Fuller Brush Agency; International Cor. School; Sewing Machine Repair Shop, Typewriter Repair Shop, Tailor Shop, Electrolux Sales & Service, and Turner Motor Service, according to Shopper Guide to Oak Ridge by Roane Anderson Company.
MED 47; 1944; Shopping Area; Illinois Ave. and Turnpike
